verses.roman:
śrī-uddhava uvāca
yathaivam anubudhyeyaṁ
vada no vadatāṁ vara

synonyms: śrī-uddhavaḥ uvāca—Śrī Uddhava said; yathā—how; evam—thus; anubudhyeyam—I may properly understand; vada—please speak; naḥ—to us; vadatām—of all speakers; vara—O You who are the best.
translation: Śrī Uddhava said: O best of all speakers, please explain to me how I may properly understand this.
